snippet: Playing at Bell Centre against goaltending ace Carey Price was a stiff test for Minnesota but these days the Wild just keep on winning....
lead_paragraph: Playing at Bell Centre against goaltending ace Carey Price was a stiff test for Minnesota but these days the Wild just keep on winning.

headline.main: Staal Helps Wild Win Ninth Straight Game, Beat Canadiens 4-2
headline.print_headline: Staal Helps Wild Win Ninth Straight Game, Beat Canadiens 4-2
